participant_1.background:
I'm single now, but my longest relationship lasted for three years.
I will continue to share my love of comic books and animals with others through my blog.
I couldn't be a school teacher like my father because I'm blind.
sometimes i wish i didn t have to wake up in the morning.
I'm still exploring my cultural heritage.

participant_2.background:
I need to move more, and get my beer gut under control.
i am a huge fan of jason mraz.
I had a client cancel her wedding a week before the big day.
I get to make gummy worms all day long, which is a dream come true for me!
I'm not happy with my job or marriage, but I'm trying to make the best of it.

content.text: Hey there! I'm a huge fan of Jason Mraz! What are some of your favorite songs by him?
Hey! My favorite song by Jason Mraz is "I'm Yours." I love the message of the song and the way it makes me feel.
That's a great song! I love the melody and the lyrics are so meaningful.
Me too! I'm glad you like it.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a gummy worm maker! It's a dream come true for me.
That's so cool! I'm sure that's a lot of fun.
It is! I get to make gummy worms all day long.
I'm jealous! I wish I could do that.
You could! It's not as hard as you might think.
I don't know, I've never really been good at cooking or baking.
It's not really cooking or baking, it's more like melting and mixing.
I see. I might have to give it a try sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
